verses.text: Do ye \w indeed|strong="H0552"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, O \w congregation|strong="H0482"\w*? do ye \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H4339"\w*, O ye \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*?\f + \fr 58.1 \ft Al-taschith…: or, Destroy not\f*\f + \fr 58.1 \ft Michtam: or, A golden Psalm\f*

Yea, in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* ye \w work|strong="H6466"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H5766"\w*; ye \w weigh|strong="H6424"\w* the \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* of your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* are \w estranged|strong="H2114"\w* from the \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*: they go \w astray|strong="H8582"\w* as soon as they be \w born|strong="H0990"\w*, \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*.\f + \fr 58.3 \ft as soon…: Heb. from the belly\f*

Their \w poison|strong="H2534"\w* \add is\add* \w like|strong="H1823"\w* the \w poison|strong="H2534"\w* of a \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w*: \add they are\add* like the \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w* \w adder|strong="H6620"\w* \add that\add* \w stoppeth|strong="H0331"\w* her \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*;\f + \fr 58.4 \ft like the poison: Heb. according to the likeness, etc\f*\f + \fr 58.4 \ft adder: or, asp\f*

Which will not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w charmers|strong="H3907"\w*, \w charming|strong="H2266"\w* never so \w wisely|strong="H2449"\w*.\f + \fr 58.5 \ft charming…: or, be the charmer never so cunning\f*

\w Break|strong="H2040"\w* their \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, in their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: break \w out|strong="H5422"\w* the great \w teeth|strong="H4459"\w* of the young \w lions|strong="H3715"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Let them melt \w away|strong="H3988"\w* as \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \add which\add* run \w continually|strong="H1980"\w*: \add when\add* he \w bendeth|strong="H1869"\w* \add his bow to shoot\add* his \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*, let them be as cut in \w pieces|strong="H4135"\w*.

As a \w snail|strong="H7642"\w* \add which\add* \w melteth|strong="H8557"\w*, let \add every one of them\add* pass \w away|strong="H1980"\w*: \add like\add* the untimely \w birth|strong="H5309"\w* of a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \add that\add* they may not \w see|strong="H2372"\w* the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*.

Before your \w pots|strong="H5518"\w* can \w feel|strong="H0995"\w* the \w thorns|strong="H0329"\w*, he shall take them away as with a \w whirlwind|strong="H8175"\w*, both \w living|strong="H2416"\w*, and in \add his\add* \w wrath|strong="H2740"\w*.\f + \fr 58.9 \ft both…: Heb. as living as wrath\f*

The \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* when he \w seeth|strong="H2372"\w* the \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w*: he shall \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* his \w feet|strong="H6471"\w* in the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

So that a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Verily \add there is\add* a \w reward|strong="H6529"\w* for the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*: verily he \w is|strong="H3426"\w* a \w God|strong="H0430"\w* that \w judgeth|strong="H8199"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 58.11 \ft a reward…: Heb. fruit of the, etc\f*
